testcase.name: Login to the nopcommerse website with valid credentials using DDT
testcase.system-out: Given User launched chrome browser..........................................passed When user open the URL as "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com"..............passed And Enter Email id as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin".........passed And Click on Login button...................................................passed Then Use see the home page having page title "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration".passed When Use click on logout button.............................................passed Then Page title should be "Your store. Login"...............................passed And User close the browser..................................................passed
